feedback.subject: Subject
feedback.thankYou: Thank you for your feedback! We'll get back to you soon.
faq.howToBook: How do I book a service?
faq.howToBookAnswer: To book a service, browse our specialists, select the service you want, choose your preferred date and time, and complete the payment. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details.
faq.cancelReschedule: Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
faq.cancelRescheduleAnswer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled time. Go to "My Bookings" in your account to make changes. Cancellation policies may vary by specialist.
faq.howPaymentsWorkAnswer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. Payment is processed when you confirm your booking. For some services, you may pay a deposit upfront and the remainder after service completion.
faq.notSatisfied: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
faq.notSatisfiedAnswer: We want you to be completely satisfied. If you're not happy with your service, please contact us within 48 hours. We'll work with you and the specialist to resolve any issues.
faq.specialistsVerifiedAnswer: All our specialists go through a thorough verification process including background checks, credential verification, and skills assessment. We also monitor reviews and ratings continuously.
faq.leaveReviewAnswer: Yes! We encourage you to leave reviews after your service is completed. This helps other customers make informed decisions and helps specialists improve their services.
faq.personalInfoSecureAnswer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information. We never share your data with third parties without your consent.
faq.updateProfile: How do I update my profile?
faq.updateProfileAnswer: Go to your account settings to update your profile information, payment methods, addresses, and preferences. Changes are saved automatically.
